page.title: 11THE FIVE BELLS & BLACK HORSE
page.content: There are two pubs.One is the Black Horse the other is the Five Bells.You would know them by the sign outside.Grown ups may go there to drink and eat.My Dad has a beer,my Mum likes a vodka and I have a Coca-Cola.Children sit outside in good weather.There are gardens with see-saws,a sandpit and swings and a slide.I buy crisps and peanuts.Grown-ups eat chicken and chips,steak,fish,gammon,steak and kidney pie.You can hear pop music.You can play dominoes,darts,snooker and pool.The pubs are open every day of the week including Sunday when lots of people come to have their dinner.They are open at dinner time and the evenings.Christmas is the merriest time.Every one joins in the fun at the New Year.There are coloured lights outside the Five Bells.
